005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.util;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
017import java.util.LinkedList;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Map;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public class RecursionCollectingNodeItemVisitor
026    extends AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor<Void, Void> {
027
028  private final Map<IAssemblyDefinition, AssemblyRecord> assemblyAnalysis = new LinkedHashMap<>();
029
030  public Set<AssemblyRecord> getRecursiveAssemblyDefinitions() {
031    return assemblyAnalysis.values().stream()
032        .filter(AssemblyRecord::isRecursive)
033        .collect(Collectors.toSet());
034  }
035
036  public void visit(@NonNull IModule module) {
037    visitMetaschema(INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module), null);
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyNodeItem item, Void context) {
042    IAssemblyDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
043
044    // get the assembly record from the cache
045    AssemblyRecord record = assemblyAnalysis.get(definition);
046    boolean retval = true;
047    if (record == null) {
048      record = new AssemblyRecord(definition);
049      assemblyAnalysis.put(definition, record);
050    } else if (isDecendant(item, definition)) {
051      record.markRecursive();
052      record.addLocation(item);
053    }
054    return super.visitAssembly(item, context);
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem item, Void context) {
059    return visitAssembly((IAssemblyNodeItem) item, context);
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  protected Void defaultResult() {
064    return null;
065  }
066
067  public static final class AssemblyRecord {
068    @NonNull
069    private final IAssemblyDefinition definition;
070    private boolean recursive; // false
071    @NonNull
072    private final List<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> locations = new LinkedList<>();
073
074    private AssemblyRecord(@NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
075      this.definition = definition;
076    }
077
078    public IAssemblyDefinition getDefinition() {
079      return definition;
080    }
081
082    public boolean isRecursive() {
083      return recursive;
084    }
085
086    public void markRecursive() {
087      recursive = true;
088    }
089
090    @NonNull
091    public List<IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> getLocations() {
092      return locations;
093    }
094
095    public void addLocation(@NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> location) {
096      this.locations.add(location);
097    }
098  }
099
100}
